1 #include <ros/ros.h>
2 #include <ros/console.h>
3 #include <actionlib/server/simple_action_server.h>
4 #include <cpswarm_msgs/TrackingAction.h>
5 #include "lib/uav_flocking_tracking.h"

7 using namespace ros;

12 behavior_state_t state;

17 int target;

22 typedef actionlib::SimpleActionServer<cpswarm_msgs::TrackingAction> action_server_t;
23 
29 void ActionCallback(const cpswarm_msgs::TrackingGoalConstPtr& goal, action_server_t* as)
30 {
31  NodeHandle nh;
32 
33  // target id
34  target = goal->target;
35 
36  // set loop rate
37  double loop_rate;
38  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/loop_rate", loop_rate, 5.0);
39  Rate rate(loop_rate);
40 
41  ROS_INFO("Executing tracking");
42 
43  // tracking library
44  uav_flocking_tracking uav_tracking(target);
45 
46  // execute coverage until state changes
47  behavior_state_t state = STATE_ACTIVE;
48  while (ok() && !as->isPreemptRequested() && state == STATE_ACTIVE) {
49  ROS_DEBUG("Tracking step");
50  behavior_state_t result = uav_tracking.step();
51  if (state == STATE_ACTIVE)
52  state = result;
53  rate.sleep();
54  spinOnce();
55  }
56 
57  // stop moving
58  uav_tracking.stop();
59 
60  // tracking succeeded
61  if (state == STATE_SUCCEEDED) {
62  ROS_INFO("Tracking succeeded");
63  as->setSucceeded();
64  }
65 
66  // tracking aborted
67  else if (state == STATE_ABORTED) {
68  ROS_INFO("Tracking aborted");
69  as->setAborted();
70  }
71 
72  // tracking was preempted
73  else{
74  ROS_INFO("Tracking preempted");
75  as->setPreempted();
76  }
77 }
78 
83 void lost_callback (const cpswarm_msgs::TargetPositionEvent::ConstPtr& msg)
84 {
85  if (msg->id == target)
86  state = STATE_ABORTED;
87 }
88 
93 void done_callback (const cpswarm_msgs::TargetPositionEvent::ConstPtr& msg)
94 {
95  if (msg->id == target)
96  state = STATE_SUCCEEDED;
97 }
98 
105 int main (int argc, char** argv)
106 {
107  // init ros node
108  init(argc, argv, "uav_tracking");
109  NodeHandle nh;
110 
111  // define which log messages are shown
112  if (console::set_logger_level(ROSCONSOLE_DEFAULT_NAME, console::levels::Info)) {
113  console::notifyLoggerLevelsChanged();
114  }
115  else{
116  ROS_ERROR("Could not set logger level!");
117  }
118 
119  // initially, no targets being tracked
120  target = -1;
121 
122  // subscribers
123  int queue_size;
124  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/queue_size", queue_size, 1);
125  Subscriber lost_sub = nh.subscribe("target_lost", queue_size, lost_callback);
126  Subscriber done_sub = nh.subscribe("target_done", queue_size, done_callback);
127 
128  // start action server
129  action_server_t as(nh, "uav_tracking", boost::bind(&ActionCallback, _1, &as), false);
130  as.start();
131 
132  // wait for action client
133  spin();
134 
135  return 0;
136 }
